pr_title: updated the post_bug fucntion and added testcases to test post_bug fuâ€¦
pr_body:
1. Updated the post_bug function in the post_bug.R file where the user can interactively report the bugs from the console.
2. Added test cases to test the post_bug function in the console to interact with the `menu()`.
3. Removed the `jsonlite` and `reshape2` dependencies as they as no longer required.

issue: #4
pr_review_comments: [{'comment_id': 672479742, 'comment_body': 'If you want to test an error or message you need to use `expect_error(post_bug(), "Do it an then return please")`. Although by being on a snapshot I think you do not need to add any other expect_error function if the function raising the error (`post_bug` is inside it: `expect_snapshot(post_bug())`', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 19, 17, 8, 26, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'llrs', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 672480305, 'comment_body': 'Better to remove this and use the argument from the function. Otherwise we are asking twice the same information from the user.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 19, 17, 9, 15, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'llrs', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 672481088, 'comment_body': 'Print is not a function to be used within a function. If you want to provide feedback to the user use the `return(bugs)`', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 19, 17, 10, 24, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'llrs', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 672481443, 'comment_body': 'As mentioned the headers are needed to post on the real database.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 19, 17, 10, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'llrs', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 672482301, 'comment_body': 'Remember that text which needs to be the description of the issue needs to be included. It is the most important part of posting an issue! Even if the API allows to post without a description ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 19, 17, 12, 6, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'llrs', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 674469372, 'comment_body': 'sure!', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 22, 3, 7, 35, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'kpiyush04', 'type': 'User'}]
